snippet: The three major United States indexes experienced modest but broad losses the day after the Nasdaq composite passed 5,000 for the first time since March 2000.
abstract: Stocks suffer modest but broad losses, falling back below nominal record highs; Nasdaq composite index falls below 5,000 on day after achieving milestone for first time since dot-com era.
lead_paragraph: The three major United States indexes experienced modest but broad losses the day after the Nasdaq composite passed 5,000 for the first time since March 2000.

headline.main: After Reaching Milestones, Markets Take a Breather
headline.print_headline: After Reaching Milestones, Markets Take a Breather
